desc: World's 1st ergonomic, comfortable and stress-free baby carrier with foldable hip seat, padded belts, adjustable leg openings for all position baby carrying from 4-36months, upto 44lbs. Optional support pole can be installed in seconds to offload all carrying load to ground. Compact, light weight & fashioned design.

layout.text: Mamapod is pioneering a baby backpack carrier for 4-month newborns to toddlers, with revolutionary design to give support where it's needed.
